text: 45|17|Ara amara taderake dinera yabatiya bisaye suspasta pramanadi dana karechilama. Tadera kache jnana asara para'o tara sudhu paraspara bidbesabasatah matabirodha karechila. Tara ye saba bisaye matabirodha karata, niscaya apanara raba kiyamatera dina tadera madhye se saba bisaye phayasala kare debena.
